description:
My place is close to restaurants and dining, 10 minutes drive the from mall, 15 minutes drive on the bus from 4 & 5 trains to Manhattan, 1 block from city buses, laundry, and 4 major hospitals. You’ll love my place because of the coziness, the location, quiet, very clean, and private. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

There is a secluded back yard that can be used to soak in the sun and enjoy a book out in the open.

All of the first floor area will be available for use with full access and not shared.

I live upstairs and will be home most of the time since I am retired.

There are wonderful restaurants in close walking distance, and a laundry. The area is quiet and surrounded by friendly neighbors.

City transit buses B7 connects to 3 train, B8 connects to 2 &5 train and B47 connects to C train. All trains travel into Manhattan.

No cable TV. Great quality over the air HD TV. Street parking is available. Other parking arrangements can be made through contact. Located 20 to 25 minutes from JFK airport. Can pickup guess from airport if enough notice is given ahead of arrival.
name: Comfortable oasis in the heart of Brooklyn
review: Thorill is the most pleasant man you'll ever meet and his hospitality is amazing. The place was perfect for what we were looking for.
